p: CS NPs loaded with Stevia rebaudiana leaf extract caused a considerable decrease of the mean fasting blood glucose level of treated diabetic rats in comparison with the diabetic control group, and serum levels of different enzymes and some antioxidants, e.g., catalase, reduced glutathione (GSH), and superoxide dismutase (SOD), were closer to normal levels in the group treated with NPs than in the control group [ 204].
